subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: In his first appearance against Boston as a Yankee since allowing a grand slam in Game 7 of the 2004 A.L.C.S., Javier Vazquez struck out Kevin Youkilis to end the ninth Monday.
snippet: In his first appearance against Boston as a Yankee since allowing a grand slam in Game 7 of the 2004 A.L.C.S., Javier Vazquez struck out Kevin Youkilis to end the ninth Monday.
